attributes.action: Allow college nursery to take from any age
attributes.additional_details: To. Allow us young parents to continue to study with our child in the college nursery so it’s easier for us so we aren’t lAte to class
attributes.background: The government should change college nursery’s to take from 3+ months to allow young parents to continue to study without having to worry about where they’re child has to go

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the age at which to accept babies are a matter for individual nurseries, not the UK Government or Parliament.
